name: Slimy Slime (YanixGames)
description:
A small video game in which you will have to make your way through a series of levels. Use your skills and move through the slime to emerge victorious. A short video game which will take you 5 minutes to finish.

A small project done for fun and that has resulted in my first videogame. I hope to receive feedback in the comments as this is my first videogame and I would like to improve.
